full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` SGROL DKAR DANG TSE DPAG MED KYI TSE'I RIL GRUB ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(ZHES PA BYA LHA 'OD ZHU BYED TSUL SNGA MA DANG 'DRA'O, ZHES PA 'DI NI CHOS SDE CHEN PO SKU 'BUM BYAMS @005B PA GLING GI TSOGS CHEN DGE BSKOS DKA' BCU SHES RAB CHOS 'BYOR DANG DBU MDZAD RAB 'BYAMS BRTZON 'GRUS BZANG PO GNYIS KYIS SBYIN BDAG SOGS KYI RIM GROR PHRAL DU TSE SGRUB DGOS SKABS TSOGS PA'I ZHAL 'DON DU 'KHYER BDE 'DI RATNA DGOS ZHES BSKUL NGOR, ,DHARMA BADZRA GYIS GA-YAR KHRAL RTZAM DU BRIS PA'I YI GE PA NI NGAG DBANG PHUN TSOGS SO, ,)
